text: IThe MSME Development Institute, Chennai, in association with the Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries, would conduct a vendor development programme and industrial seminar on exports in the city on Thursday. The programme, meant for units looking for new market opportunities and aspiring entrepreneurs, would focus on vendor opportunities with Railways, vendor registration procedure in Railways for engineering industries, credit schemes of banks and export opportunities and procedure, according to a press release from S.Punniyamurthy, Secretary, TIDITSSIA. The event will be held at 10 a.m. at Ravi Mini Hall near Chathram Bus Stand in the city. Participants will have to pay a registration fee of Rs. 200 each. Those who wish to participate can register their names with B. Packiarajan, Assistant Director, MSME Development Institute, over telephone by calling 8939575857 or at the TIDITSSIA Office at Ariyamangalam in the city (telephone: 0431-2440119/2440114).
title: Programme for vendors
